name: Slime Juice
description:
The web version may lag and present low graphics quality, Windows version is REALLY recommended for a better experience.

Slime Juice is an adventure game where you control a small slime that must destroy the company that are slaving your friends and destroying your planet. 

You go throught the planet, freeing your friends and destroying the machines that are extracting the slime juice that gives life to all creatures.

In this game you are a slime that use his own mass (slime juice) to damage enemies. Stay out of slime juice means that you die. Slime Enemys also try to infect you, be aware.

How to play

Use "WASD" to move.

"Mouse" to aim

"Mouse1" to Simple Shot

"Mouse2" Charged Shoot

"E" to interact with NPCs.

Simple Shot: You shoot small balls of slime juice dealing damage to the adversaries, if you miss the attack the spheres can be collected and reincorporated to your body.

Charged Shoot: Loaded Shot: Fires a large amount of sludge juice causing great damage, but the shot mass cannot be collected.

This game was made for MashUp GameJam where the theme was "Size Matters".
